name: BioTelemetry, Inc.
description: BioTelemetry, Inc. is a leading provider of remote cardiac monitoring and diagnostic services. Founded in 1996, the company specializes in innovative health technology solutions that enable healthcare providers to monitor patients' heart health from the comfort of their homes. BioTelemetry's services encompass a range of cardiac monitoring systems, including mobile cardiac telemetry, event monitoring, and Holter monitoring. They leverage advanced technologies and data analytics to provide actionable insights into patients' heart conditions, enhancing patient care and outcomes. The company is committed to improving the quality of life for patients by delivering timely and accurate information to physicians, thereby facilitating informed decision-making. BioTelemetry also offers a suite of wearable devices and mobile applications, allowing patients to manage their health more effectively. With a focus on innovation and patient-centered care, BioTelemetry strives to transform the way cardiac health is monitored and managed, ultimately contributing to better health outcomes in the population.
